summary: Add a way to disable implicit durable timers in Ruby SDK workflows, particularly for use with OpenTelemetry simple span processors that need non-durable timeouts. Implementation requires `Temporalio::Workflow::Unsafe.implicit_durable_timers_disabled` helper and integration with OTel span creation.
userImpact: Users cannot currently use OpenTelemetry simple span processors in workflows because the implicit durable timeouts conflict with non-durable timeout requirements.
rootCause: Implicit durable timers are always enabled by default, but some telemetry use cases (simple span processors) require non-durable timeouts which are incompatible.
proposedFix: Create `Temporalio::Workflow::Unsafe.implicit_durable_timers_disabled` helper to allow disabling implicit durable timers, and integrate with OTel span creation/recording.
resolutionDetails: Feature implemented to allow disabling implicit durable timers for compatibility with OpenTelemetry simple span processors.
